video_info.title: Super Smash 2025/26 Men's
video_info.shortDescription: Auckland Aces are set to battle the Central Stags in a decisive Super Smash clash at Eden Park. With this being the final league match before the eliminator, the focus is on whether the hosts can secure a top two finish or if the visitors will claim a crucial away triumph. To find out who comes on top as we bring you all the action from the Super Smash 2025/26 Men's, LIVE on Sony LIV.
